mapper.insert: insert into pay_means_reg(pay_means_id, user_id, own_type, bill_key, default_pay_means_yn, card_co_info_agree_yn, card_co_type, dba_reg_id) values (#{pay_means_id}, #{user_id}, #{own_type}, #{bill_key}, #{default_pay_means_yn}, #{card_co_info_agree_yn}, #{card_co_type}, #{dba_reg_id})
mapper.update: update pay_means_reg set default_pay_means_yn = 'N', dba_mod_dtm = now(), dba_mod_id = #{dba_mod_id} where default_pay_means_yn = 'Y'
mapper.select: select * from pay_means_reg order by dba_reg_dtm DESC
